  • Class
    Description
    ComparisonContext
    A ComparisonContext contains all information that can be used for comparing similarity between objects that occur within ArDoCo.
    WordSimLoader
    Responsible for loading the word similarity measures that should be enabled according to the CommonTextToolsConfig.
    WordSimMeasure
    A measure that can determine whether two words from a ComparisonContext are similar.
    WordSimUtils
    A static class that provides various utility methods to calculate similarity between different kinds of objects.
